Games.Name: Flappy Bird
Games.ShortDescription: Play as the cute yellow bird and try to avoid the pipes to collect points
Games.LongDescription: Play as the cute yellow bird and try to avoid the pipes to collect points

Games.Name: Whack-A-Mole
Games.ShortDescription: Hit the Mole ASAP. watch out for the plants, they'll bite off your fingers
Games.LongDescription: Hit the Mole ASAP. watch out for the plants, they'll bite off your fingers

Games.Name: Dino
Games.ShortDescription: Play the classic old dinosour game, avoid the obstacles and earn points.
Games.LongDescription: Play the classic old dinosour game, avoid the obstacles and earn points.
